posts.title: Giant Rubber Duck Pool Float
posts.content: Rub a dub dub jump on the giant rubber duck pool float, just not in the tub. This over-sized rubber ducky inflates to a whopping 60″ x 48″ tall yellow duck that loves to be ridden around on hot days as you cool off at the local watering hole.

posts.title: Childless Dual Income Family Car Decal
posts.content: Let everyone know just how fabulous your “unfulfilled childless life” is going with this dual income family car sticker. Rather than having to worry about diapers and college tuitions, you and your spouse are out blowing your surplus of cash on whatever tickles your fancy.

posts.title: Stranger Things Ouija Board
posts.content: Unlock the secrets of the enigmatic realm of the Upside Down by gathering a few brave souls around this Stranger Things Ouija board. Based on the hit Netflix show, the game board features the iconic twinkly Christmas lights strung up above each letter.

posts.title: Human Horse Hooves
posts.content: That horse mask of yours isn’t fooling anyone – at least not without the human horse hooves to complete the disguise. These 14″ latex hooves look remarkably real and slip on like gloves and can be removed quickly when you need to use your inferior human hands.

posts.title: Gigantic Pink Flamingo Float
posts.content: Make a splash during your next day of fun in the sun by hitting the water with this gigantic pink flamingo float. It’s made from heavy duty vinyl and rises over 5 feet high when fully inflated – making it large enough to easily accommodate two people.

posts.title: Hangover Remedy Tablets
posts.content: Speed up your recovery after a night of some heavy binge drinking by taking these hangover remedy tablets the morning after. These FDA regulated tablets are designed to hydrate your body and relieve unpleasant symptoms like headaches and wine shits.

posts.title: Bat Signal Projector Pen
posts.content: Keep Gotham’s Dark Knight at your beck and call by summoning him anytime you want using this bat signal projector pen. At the press of a button, the Caped Crusader’s iconic bat shaped logo projects onto whatever surface you point it towards.

posts.title: Hog Dog Pet Costume
posts.content: Get your small furry friend in on all the Halloween fun this year by slipping him into this adorable hot dog pet costume. This hilarious little getup will turn your festive pup into a plump and juicy hot dog topped with lettuce and mustard.

posts.title: Rice Ball Kitten Mold
posts.content: Make lunchtime more exciting for the young ones by bringing their meals to life using this rice ball kitten mold. Complete with a mold, cutting mat, and seaweed cutter, you’ll have everything you need to create cute little edible feline rice balls.

posts.title: The Zombie Apocalypse Survival Manual
posts.content: Learn how to protect yourself when the inevitable downfall of society occurs by reading the Zombie Apocalypse Survival Manual. It contains loads of life-saving information on survival basics, including how to thrive in the post-apocalyptic world.

posts.title: Vandalism Starter Kit
posts.content: Liven up your home’s drab decor with a little urban art using this vandalism starter kit. The work of prolific POPaganda contemporary artist Ron English is transformed into vibrant stickers you can peel off and stick anywhere you want.

posts.title: S’mores Roasting Rack
posts.content: Take your favorite flame cooked desert from the open flame of a camp fire to the comfort of your home grill with the s’mores roasting rack. This ultra practical stainless steel rack makes it possible to cook several s’mores simultaneously in just one easy step.
